name: Hamster in the Mirror
description:
Made for http://ssdj.am/ game jam. Theme was "Being Alone / Being Together"

A game that you play using your body and arms. Goal is to get apples to go from left to right and guide them with your arms like a bridge. Game is played using a regular camera (including your laptop camera!). use your left and right arms to move 

Gameplay video:

Might not work on mac so let me know in comments and I might be able to work on that.
